name: The Legends of Irtum: A New Dawn
name_original: The Legends of Irtum: A New Dawn
description:
Explore in this vast iconic 2D world made with RPG Maker MV. Follow Alex, Ander and Therm through an interactive story.

(This game is obviously not perfect, so if you find any bugs you can post them below in the comments, or on our forums here: https://qytarstudios.freeforums.net)
